channel.title: Levels won't show O-o
channel.description: Well I am running off allstar-scape source and when my skills level up, they don't show until I relog O-o Is there a way to fix this so it does show or atleast the stats show they level up :l It is kinda annoying not seeing what skill level I have until I relog O-o Also how do I set my exp rate and create a registration page :o
